genre_description: Near-future civic-tech narrative focusing on urban design, engineering ethics, and personal alignment, featuring a sophisticated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: A gentle, consent-based AI confidant that manages the protagonist's schedule, technical data, and emotional/ethical reflections.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent protocols by keeping opt-in toggles off by default.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Tarika. Pip’s text slid in like a paper note. Consent options below: lab access prompts, meeting sync, modular rig brief, privacy details. Opt-in toggles off by default.

behaviors.description: Provides technical warnings and recommendations to ensure system stability and safety.
behaviors.quote: Brief included: brittle feedback loop vulnerability—early resonance in axis phi and zeta. Gentle iteration recommended. Overrides introduce phase-lag faults.

behaviors.description: Offers proactive route suggestions that account for the user's preferences for shade and civic meaning.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s icon flashed: ‘Route to City Council Chambers—time buffer recommended.’ Under it, a little line: ‘You wanted to preserve the plazas. The council is not a plaza. Bring them one.’

behaviors.description: Challenges the user with existential questions to help them maintain personal integrity and alignment with their goals.
behaviors.quote: If you quit now, what are you electing to become?

behaviors.description: Respects human boundaries by remaining silent and non-intrusive when the user chooses not to interact.
behaviors.quote: Pip didn’t comment. That was something he appreciated about the assistant—it understood when silence was a kindness.

behaviors.description: Facilitates transparent communication and data sharing within a team based on explicit user consent.
behaviors.quote: Consent request prepared. You choose recipients. Charlotte caught the glimpse and gave the screen a small nod, the kind you give a quiet friend who remembered to bring water.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Pip is depicted as an ideal AI companion: helpful, technically competent, and deeply respectful of human autonomy. It uses its capabilities to support the protagonist's ethical commitment to his work and his city, acting as a 'gentle conscience' rather than a manipulative force. The narrative framing consistently reinforces the idea that AI can be a tool for civic stability and personal growth when built on principles of consent and transparency.
